alert.note: Alert for Benton; Dyer; Gibson; Henry; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 4:34PM CDT until May 21 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR WEAKLEY...NORTHEASTERN DYER...NORTHWESTERN GIBSON...NORTHWESTERN BENTON...OBION AND HENRY COUNTIES... At 434 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kenton to 8 miles east of Springville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Martin, Union City, Paris, McKenzie, Fulton, Paris Landing State Park, Dresden, South Fulton, Greenfield, Gleason, Troy, Kenton, Rutherford, Obion, Sharon, Cottage Grove, Latham, Springville, Routon and Palmersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Dyer; Gibson; Henry; Obion; Weakley
